sapier/monorail.description:
Version 0.0.6
Monorail mod similar to carts.
-Ridable cart
-Transport cart
-Mesecon integration (optional)

racsorhodes/travelpoints.description:
Travelpoints 1.4 2015-03-27

Save world specific bookmarks to locations you travel to as "travelpoints", then easily teleport to those travelpoints.

You can also create transporter pads whose destination can be set to an existing travelpoint, no need to ever enter coords by hand.

For a complete list of available chat commands see readme.txt.

rubenwardy/food.description: Adds soups, cakes, bakes and juices. The largest supporting food mod for Minetest.

nore/mg.description:
This mod changes the default map generation: it changes the way ores are placed, add new biomes and villages.
Note: do NOT use it in an already generated world!!!

rubenwardy/awards.description: Adds achievements to Minetest, and an API to register new ones.

excalibur zero/brazier.description: This is a mod for Minetest that adds fire braziers.

heroofthewinds/lockpicks.description: Adds lockpicks to Minetest and updates most locked objects to be breakable.

evergreen/death_messages.description: A Minetest mod which sends a chat message when a player dies.

evergreen/quartz.description: Adds quartz ore and some decorative quartz blocks

joz/railcorridors.description:
This mod tries to imitate the known rail corridors of Minecraft.

Diese Modifikation versucht die aus Minecraft bekannten Minensch√§chte mit Schienen nachzubilden.

excalibur zero/moretechnictools.description: This is a Minetest mod that adds more Technic tools.

don/myroofs.description: This is a Minetest mod that adds mesh roofing nodes.

vanessae/nixie_tubes.description: This mod provides a set of classic Nixie tubes, and a set of alphanumeric 15-segment tubes similar to Burroughs B-7971, controlled by Mesecons' Digilines mod.

bobomb/realterrain.description: A mapgen mod that allows any image to be used as a heightmap. If the image is not grayscale then the red channel is used. A tool is provided to change settings in-game.

rubenwardy/jump.title: Infinite Jump Challenge
rubenwardy/jump.description: Jump across stilts forever. Completely modifies the gameplay of Minetest.

rubenwardy/diet.description: Adds a mechanic to encourage food variety.

rubenwardy/vote.description: Adds an API to allow players to vote, also adds kick voting.

dragonop/claycrafter.description: Craft clay out of compressed dirt.

rubenwardy/chatplus.description:
Adds chat functions such as ignoring, distance limiting, and swear filtering.
Also provides a powerful API, and optionally allows distance limiting.

don/cutepie.description: Cute blocks with a happy feel to them.

rubenwardy/email.description: Adds email style inboxes to Minetest.

jp/craftguide.description: A simple, flexible and efficient Crafting Guide.

chinchow/ethereal.description: Ethereal mod uses the v7 mapgen to add many new biomes to the world.

sapier/factions.description:
Version 1.1.5

Mod for handling in game factions and reputation

rubenwardy/forceload.description: Keeps areas of the map loaded even when players are not online.

don/myboardgames.description: This is a modpack with 16 mini games. It includes chess, checkers, connect 4, uno and more.

don/myitemchest.description: A chest the spawns items when opened.

rubenwardy/privilegeareas.description: Granting and revoking privileges based on position on the map.

kilarin/bridgetool.description: This mod adds a new "bridge tool" that makes placing stone (or glass, earth, or any material) while building a bridge in no-fly mode easy.

yugiohjcj/interaction_areas.description: A minetest mod to manage interaction areas.

splizard/lifter.description:
Simply craft the lift with the following craft recipe:

wood stick wood
wood mese wood
wood stick wood

Now place your lift in a shaft or next to a wall. Right click on your lift to get on it and then tap spacebar to go up a level or tap shift to go down a level...
So easy!!!
If you want to stop the lift at any time, press the "use" key.
Now that you have reached your destination simply walk off the lift :)

byakuren/loot.description: A loot framework. Also adds loot to dungeons.

don/mychisel.description:
A chisel that allows you to shape blocks.

To craft a chisel just put a steel ingot and a brown wool in the crafting grid. The steel goes above the wool.

Once you have your chisel you can set the style by right clicking. 

There are 5 styles to choose from
- horizontal groove
- vertical groove
- cross groves (this matches up with the vertical and horizontal grooves
- square
- 4 edges

Right click until you see the style you want in the chat then point at the node and left click.
Each node can be cut 4 times. Each time you chisel the groove will get a little deeper.

Only certain nodes can be chiseled. Here are the supported nodes


	Cobble
	Sandstone
	Clay
	Coal Block
	Stone
	Desert Stone"
	Wood
	Acacia Wood
	Aspen Wood
	Pine Wood
	Desert Cobble
	Jungle Wood
	Sandstone Brick
	Stone Brick
	Desert Stone Brick

Forum - https://forum.minetest.net/viewtopic.php?f=11&t=13104

don/mydeck.description: Make realistic looking decks on your house.

rui/playeranim.description: Adds animations to the players' head and right arm.

sofar/sedimentology-mt.description: A mod that adds realistic erosion and degradation of rocks.

jp/spectator_mode.description:
A mod for Minetest allowing you to watch other players in their 3rd person view.
You're invisible and undetectable for the players when you're in this mode.

jp/workbench.description: A mod adding a Work Bench for Minetest.

byakuren/multiblock.description: A library for matching block structures.

tenplus1/farming.description: Adds many plants and food to Minetest

tenplus1/mobs.description: Adds a mob api for mods to add animals or monsters etc.

don/mycorners.description:
Put decorative corners on blocks.

mycorners makes it so you can add  corners on blocks like the corners of castles and houses. 

Just build a machine and make your cornerboards. You can add the corners to blocks in the machine or use the hammer to set them.

You will have beautiful buildings in no time.

evergreen/trash_can.description: This mod adds a wooden trash can, and a dumpster to the game.  Right click it, put in your trash, and click the empty trash button.

stu/wield3d.description:
Visible 3d wielded items for Minetest.
Adds 3d wield-items that are visible in third person view and to other players.

byakuren/monoidal_effects.description:
monoidal_effects is a framework for player status effects and state that allows
multiple effects to affect the same state at once.

sofar/crops.description:
This mod expands the basic set of farming-related crops that minetest_game offers. It adds melons, potatoes, tomatoes, green beans and corn. The mod also implements plant humidity - you will have to water plants to make sure they're not dried out, or make sure they don't get over-watered.

Mod specific settings can be changed in the "crops_settings.txt" file in the world folder.

For more information, go to: http://goo.gl/wf0XLh

jp/enchanting.description: A mod adding a Minecraft-inspired Enchantment Table to Minetest.

rubenwardy/report.description: Allows players to report misconduct or bugs using /report.

sakel/spawners.description: This mod adds several creatures to Minetest, including zombies, ghosts, and sheep.

heroofthewinds/caverealms.description: A mod for Minetest to add underground realms.

philipbenr/castles.description: This is a mod all about creating castles and castle dungeons. Many of the nodes are used for the outer-walls or dungeons.

stu/shooter.description:
First person shooter mod.
Adds firearms plus a few other fun items.

sofar/torches.description: Mesh-based torches - three dimensional torches for minetest.

napiophelios/alignedbricks.description:
This mod aligns all sides of default brick nodes
to maintain a continuous staggered pattern
from all points of view.

pilzadam/nether.description: Adds a deep underground realm with different mapgen that you can reach with obsidian portals.

vanessae/biome_lib.description: The biome spawning and management library for Plantlife, Moretrees, Tiny Trees, and other mods that originally depended on plants_lib from the plantlife modpack.

vanessae/coloredwood.description: This mod provides a multitude of colors of wood, sticks, and fences to Minetest, as per the palette outlined by my Unified Dyes mod.

vanessae/gloopblocks.description:
Adds decorative and functional blocks, including cement, rainbow blocks, "evil" blocks and sticks, 
and the usual collection of tools of various strengths and speeds made from either cement or "evil" components.

calinou/maptools.description: Adds various special versions of normal blocks, tools, and other map maintainer tools.

jeija/minetest-mod-digilines.description: This mod adds digiline wires, an RTC (Real Time Clock), a light sensor as well as an LCD Screen. Can be used together with the luacontroller from mesecons.

calinou/moreblocks.description: Adds various miscellaneous blocks to the game.

vanessae/moretrees.description: This mod adds a whole bunch of new types of trees to the game

megaf/more_chests.description: Adds several chests that behave differently, and can be used to donate items, share items, hide chests, make secret chests, and more.

don/mymillwork.description:
Crown molding, columns and baseboards of different styles.



If you want to add or remove a texture simply edit the table at the top of millwork.lua file.

Right now I have these textures: White, Sandstone, Desert Sand and Clay. The others are commented out. 

Each texture has 28 nodes so careful that you don't add too many textures.

vanessae/pipeworks.description: This mod uses nodeboxes to supply a complete set of 3D pipes and tubes, along devices that work with them.

vanessae/unifieddyes.description: Unified Dyes expands the standard dye set from 15 to 90 colors.

lag01/chat_anticurse.description: Kick player out when he type curse word in chat or using /me or /msg command. Checks for some English and Russian curse words.

lag01/chat2.description: Complements game built-in chat or replaces it.

excalibur zero/fireballs.description: This is a mod for Minetest that adds fireballs, among other things.

enke/inlaid.description:
This mod adds mineral textures onto nodes. Currently in version 1.4.1
You can inform me of bugs by creating an issue in github. https://github.com/NANOsoldierEnke/inlaid

lag01/spawn_command.description: Adds a /spawn command that telepors you to the server spawn command.

don/batmod.description:
This mod adds a lot of nodes that are Batman like.

The color theme is black and yellow. There are many things such as building blocks, lights, doors and more.

sanchez/blox.description: Adds lots of differently colored and textured blocks to Minetest.

rubenwardy/food_sweet.description: Adds cakes, buns and tarts. Expansion pack for the food mod.

don/mysheetmetal.description: Gutters, fashia and soffit makes your house look great.

don/mymulch.description: Turn leaves,sticks and more into mulch.

don/mysponge.description: Soak up water with a sponge.

dragonop/tools_obsidian.description: Adds obsidian dagger, sword, and longsword.

don/worldedge.description: Allows you to limit the size of your world.

mtango688/caches.description: This mod adds containers for Technic that store a single type of item in large amounts. The containers are simple, portable, and upgradeable.
